name: SUBMORPHIA
description:
The year is 2034. Humanity is facing yet another threat of extinction. Sea creatures known as "vampyromorpha" has settled in the depths of the ocean.

You are sent to investigate one of the small nests of the bloodsucking creatures. Locate and destroy the nest to put an end to the centuries old enemy of humanity.

Originally released on May 09, 2018 for the Submarine Jam.
